mapper.select: SELECT MONEY , MCOUNT FROM WLCHECK WHERE RTTYPE=#{rtType} AND RTTIME = (SELECT MAX(RTTIME) FROM WLCHECK WHERE RTTYPE=#{rtType})
SELECT WL_SPECIALNOTE FROM WL WHERE WL_TIME = (SELECT MAX(WL_TIME) FROM WL)
SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR((RT_TIME),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS MAXTIME FROM RT WHERE RT_SIASHCODE=#{shCode}

SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, SH_IMG AS SHIMG, SH_TYPE AS SHTYPE, SIA_ABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME FROM SIA INNER JOIN SH ON SIA_SHCODE = SH_CODE INNER JOIN AB ON SIA_ABCODE = AB_CODE WHERE SIA_ABCODE=#{abCode}

SELECT MTD_MTSHCODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, MTD_MTTLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER, TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT, MTD_MTDETAIL AS MTDETAIL, MTD_ABCODE AS ABCODE FROM MTD INNER JOIN TL ON MTD.MTD_MTTLNUMBER = TL.TL_NUMBER INNER JOIN SH ON MTD.MTD_MTSHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE MTD_ABCODE = #{abCode} AND MTD_MTSHCODE = #{shCode}
SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME FROM SIA INNER JOIN SH ON SIA.SIA_SHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}

SELECT SIA_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", SIA_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME" FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE INNER JOIN SH ON SIA.SIA_SHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}
SELECT AB_CODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME" FROM AB WHERE AB_CODE = #{abCode}

SELECT SS_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SS_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", SS_BANKNAME AS "SSBANKNAME", SS_ACCOUNT AS "SSACCOUNT", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_BIRTH AS "ABBIRTH", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR", AB_EMAIL AS "ABEMAIL", AB_GENDER AS "ABGENDER", AC_BANKNAME AS "ACBANKNAME", AC_ACCOUNT AS "ACACCOUNT" FROM SS INNER JOIN AB ON SS.SS_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE INNER JOIN AC ON AB.AB_CODE = AC.AC_ABCODE WHERE SS_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND SS_ABCODE=#{abCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SS WHERE SS_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND SS_ABCODE=#{abCode}
mapper.select: SELECT SS_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SS_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL", SH_IMG AS "SHIMG" FROM SS INNER JOIN SH ON SS.SS_SHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE SS_ABCODE = #{abCode}

SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL", MN_NAME AS "MNNAME", MN_PHONE AS "MNPHONE", SH_IMG AS "SHIMG" FROM SH INNER JOIN MN ON SH.SH_MNCODE = MN.MN_CODE WHERE SH_CODE = #{shCode}

SELECT AB_CODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_BIRTH AS "ABBIRTH", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR", AB_EMAIL AS "ABEMAIL", AB_GENDER AS "ABGENDER", AC_BANKNAME AS "ACBANKNAME", AC_ACCOUNT AS "ACACCOUNT" FROM AB INNER JOIN AC ON AB.AB_CODE = AC.AC_ABCODE WHERE AB_CODE = #{abCode}
SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL" FROM SH WHERE SH_APPLYSTATE = 'I'

SELECT MTD_MTSHCODE AS SHCODE, MTD_ABCODE AS ABCODEM, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, MTD_MTTLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER, MTD_MTDETAIL AS MTDETAIL FROM MTD INNER JOIN AB ON MTD_ABCODE = AB_CODE WHERE MTD_MTSHCODE=#{shCode} AND MTD_ABCODE=#{abCode}
SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL" FROM SH WHERE SH_APPLYSTATE = 'I' AND SH_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL" FROM SH WHERE SH_APPLYSTATE = 'I' AND SH_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

select ab_code as abCode, ab_id as abId, ab_pw as abPw ,ab_name as abName,ab_birth as abBirth,ab_gender as abGender, ac_bankname as acBankName, ac_account as acAccount from ab inner join ac on ac.ac_abcode = ab.ab_code where ab.ab_code = #{abCode} group by ab.ab_code,ab.ab_id,ab.ab_pw,ab.ab_name,ab.ab_birth,ab.ab_gender,ac.ac_bankname,ac.ac_account
mapper.update: update AB set AB_NAME = #{abName} where AB_CODE =#{abCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AC WHERE AC_ABCODE = #{abCode} AND AC_ACCOUNT = #{acAccount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AC (AC_ABCODE, AC_BANKNAME, AC_ACCOUNT) VALUES(#{abCode}, #{acBankName}, #{acAccount})
mapper.update: update AB set AB_PW =#{abPw} where AB_CODE =#{abCode}
mapper.select: SELECT SC_SIASHCODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, SC_SIAABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, SC_STARTTIME AS STARTTIME, SC_ENDTIME AS ENDTIOME, SC_STCODE AS STCODE, ST_COMMENT AS STCOMMENT FROM SC INNER JOIN SH ON SC_SIASHCODE=SH_CODE INNER JOIN AB ON SC_SIAABCODE=AB_CODE INNER JOIN ST ON SC_STCODE=ST_CODE WHERE SC_SIAABCODE=#{abCode} AND SC_STCODE=#{stCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SC WHERE SC_STCODE=#{stCode} AND SC_SIAABCODE=#{abCode}
